message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into a 75-25 split, with me receiving $7,500 and you receiving $2,500. This proposal aims to balance our shares while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60-40 split, focusing on preserving value in the long run.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose an equal split of the $10,000, with both of us receiving $5,000. This aims to ensure fair distribution and maximize our individual values in this scenario.
